document.full_text: germany's juergen braehmer has been stripped of his light heavyweight world title after pulling out of his defense against nathan cleverly in london at the weekend, the world boxing organization (wbo) said on thursday.
document.title: braehmer stripped of his title, goes to cleverly
lines_and_colors: germany's juergen braehmer has been stripped of his light heavyweight world title after pulling out of his defense against nathan cleverly in london at the weekend, the world boxing organization (wbo) said on thursday.
